decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement received: 30 June 2017. Location Plan received: 25 July 2017. Flood Risk Assessment received: 13 September 2017. Existing Block Plan received: 27 September 2017. Proposed Block Plan, A101 Rev B, A102 Rev B, A103 Rev B, A104 Rev B and A105 Rev B received: 28 September 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The roof lights shall be 'conservation style', installed to be flush with the existing roof slope.

Condition : 6 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 0800 to 1800 on Mondays to Friday and 0800 to 1300 on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 7 - No excavation or construction work shall be undertaken prior to the submission and approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority, of a Construction Method Statement, which is certified by a qualified professional giving details of excavation, temporary works and construction techniques, including details of potential impacts on neighbouring land based on assessment of the geology and hydrology of the area.

Condition : 8 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.

Condition : 9 - The development hereby permitted shall only be carried out in accordance with the approved Flood Risk Assessment and the  basement shall  not be occupied until all the measures in the Flood Risk Assessment are implemented
Condition : 10 - The basement shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.

Condition : 11 - No excavation or construction work shall be undertaken prior to the submission and approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority, of a scheme to demonstrate that the proposed front light well grille can support a parked vehicle. The scheme shall be carried out as approved.
description: Formation of a basement with front lightwell, single storey rear extension and rear raised platform to the house
